description: This file defines a Qwik component for a Todo List application using Qwik and Qwik City frameworks. It includes imports, a data list, loaders, actions, and a React-like component rendering the UI with form handling.

methods.name: useListLoader
methods.description: Loads the current list of to-do items from the server or state.

methods.name: useAddToListAction
methods.description: Handles adding a new item to the list, validates input with Zod schema.
